fulltext:
TIEN NGUYEN
Web Developer
e
Ho Chi Minh Clty, Vietnam
80
PROFILE
A developer with 3 years of experience in programming, web and mobile application development. Can
work in both front-end and back-end side. Seeking to leverage my technical and professional expertise to
learn and grow.
EXPERIENCE
Flynk
Front-end Developer
Feb 2018 - Present
Responsibilities
Specialized in front-end development with many Australian outsourcing projects:
InterCheck Australia, Particular Audience, KentAndLime, RedSoda, etc.
Interviewed front-end developer positions
Achievements
Developed core platform code which was reused among almost every projects
Promoted to senior developer after the first year
Designveloper
Full-stack Developer
Jun 2017 - Jan 2018
Responsibilities
Worked as a full stack developer with many oversea outsourcing projects:
Lumin PDF, TalentWasabi, MVS, etc.
Applied pair programming and daily meeting
Communicated directly with clients to understand the requirement
Achievements
Wrote unit test for LuminTools to reduce bug and refactor risk
Rescued MongoDB server with over 22 millon records went down in LuminApp
Camos
Software Developer
Oct 2016 - May 2017
Responsibilities
Developed new features and maintained company product
Set up and checked system before events
Managed system and generated reports
Achievements
Developed realtime uploading photos from user smartphone via socket
Fh
SKILLS
HTML
CSS
JAVASCRIPT
REACTJS
REACT NATIVE
NODEJS
EXPRESSJS
MONGODB
IM
EDUCATION
Foreign Trade University, Hanoi
Business Administration
2013 - 2016
IM

Webpack - Udemy

LANGUAGES
